Brian Hall (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Brian_Hall_(actor) 0 Brian Charles Hall (20 November 1937 – 17 September 1997) was an English actor. He played hotel chef Terry Hugh in the British sitcom Fawlty Towers. Brian_Charles_Hall ( 20_November_1937 – 17_September_1997 ) was an_English_actor . He played hotel_chef_Terry_Hugh in the_British_sitcom_Fawlty_Towers .
